text: In this video, we will show you
the easiest way to download GTA V for PC.

We will be using the popular
online gaming store Steam.

To start, open Steam and
search "Grand Theft Auto V."
Click on the game when it appears.
You'll be directed to the store page

that has the base game
and accompanying DLC.

If you've already purchased
the game on Steam,
a play button will appear.
However, keep in mind this doesn't mean
the game is downloaded already.
If you don't see a play button,

purchase what edition
of the game you like.

Once you own the game, go
to your library on Steam

and scroll until you
see Grand Theft Auto V.
Click "INSTALL," choose the download path,
and follow the prompts.

You can check the
progress of your download
on the game's page in your library

or by going to the
downloading tab of Steam.
Once the game finishes downloading,
you can hit play to launch.

You'll then be asked to install
Rockstar Games Launcher.
Follow the prompts,
choose an install location,
and then download the client.
Once the Rockstar Game Launcher opens,
make a Rockstar account.

You will then be directed to
the main page of the launcher.

You can locate GTA V under
the "My library" tab.
Click "PLAY ON STEAM."

When prompted, link your
new Rockstar account
to your Steam account.

A Rockstar activation
code will then appear
for your copy of GTA V.
We already downloaded GTA to this machine,

so we won't show this
on-screen in this video,

but once your check
comes back as successful,
check the box below it and press "REDEEM."
You can then close the window

and the game will launch soon
after, ready to be played.
